title: Quality Check Issue
description: Schema for quality check issues reported by TypeScript, ESLint, or Prettier

engine.description: The quality check engine that reported the issue

severity.description: The severity level of the issue

file.description: Absolute path to the file containing the issue

line.description: Line number where the issue occurs (1-based)

col.description: Column number where the issue starts (1-based)

endLine.description: Line number where the issue ends (1-based)

endCol.description: Column number where the issue ends (1-based)

suggestion.description: Optional suggestion for fixing the issue
